name: Fast Food (itch) (jessespurlin)
description:
"FAST FOOD"

A post-apocalyptic side-scrolling shooter with a bad case of the munchies.

Shoot your way through the greasy mutant hordes of a post-apocalyptic Fast Fast wasteland.

*Sprites, Animation, Music, Sound Effects, Code, and Concept by Jesse Spurlin

*Burger and Hot dog drawings by Darcy DuBose. We worked on this together and this art is not online but here is a link to some of her other work:

http://darcydraws.tumblr.com/tagged/darcy-dubose

If I had more time, I would have made some kind of end goal instead of just an endless random shooter to increase your score. Including different levels and further refining the art work and music is something I will continue to work on in my spare time.

Jesse Spurlin, 2016
